metadata.title: CVE-2024-35242 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Composer is a dependency manager for PHP. On the 2.x branch prior toversions 2.2.24 and 2.7.7, the `composer install` command running inside agit/hg repository which has specially crafted branch names can lead tocommand injection. This requires cloning untrusted repositories. Patchesare available in version 2.2.24 for 2.2 LTS or 2.7.7 for mainline. As aworkaround, avoid cloning potentially compromised repositories.

criterions.comment: composer package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
